objects.name: Analytic 0309
objects.description: Detection correlates message events in email and collaboration tools (e.g., Outlook, Teams) that contain regex-like patterns resembling credentials, API keys, or tokens. Anomalous forwarding or bulk copy activity of chat/email content containing secrets is flagged. Suspicious behavior includes users pasting secrets into direct messages or attaching config files with passwords.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: m365:unified
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: MessageSend, MessageRead, or FileAttached events containing credential-like patterns

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Customizable credential-detection regex (e.g., API_KEY=, bearer token formats) depending on enterprise apps in use
Exclude known trusted domains or automated system-to-system messages
Adjust correlation period for bulk credential sharing events
